languages.text: "Ха. Я мог бы дать этот совет и не лапая гнусное ксеносское творение. Но жрец определенно соображает, как обращаться с нелюдской машинерией. Мне такой подход по нраву".
"Ha. I could have given that advice without laying a finger on the vile work of xenos. But at least the Priest knows how to deal with inhuman machinery. A scholar after my own heart."
languages.original_text: "Ха. Я мог бы дать этот совет и не лапая гнусное ксеносское творение. Но жрец определенно соображает, как обращаться с нелюдской машинерией. Мне такой подход по нраву".

traits.locale_text: "Ha. I could have given that advice without laying a finger on the vile work of xenos. But at least the Priest knows how to deal with inhuman machinery. A scholar after my own heart."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “哈，我就算不碰那台邪恶的异形机械，也能给出这样的建议。不过，看来那个技术神甫也知道该怎么对付这种异形的破烂，真是个合我心意的学者。”
languages.original_text: "Ha. I could have given that advice without laying a finger on the vile work of xenos. But at least the Priest knows how to deal with inhuman machinery. A scholar after my own heart."

traits.locale_text: “哈，我就算不碰那台邪恶的异形机械，也能给出这样的建议。不过，看来那个技术祭司也知道该怎么对付这种异形的破烂，真是个合我心意的学者。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「フン。そんなことは俺にだって言えたろうよ。異種族の忌まわしいモノに触れるまでもなくな。だが少なくとも司祭は外道の機械の扱いをわかってる。気に入ったぜ」
languages.original_text: "Ha. I could have given that advice without laying a finger on the vile work of xenos. But at least the Priest knows how to deal with inhuman machinery. A scholar after my own heart."

traits.locale_text: 「フン。そんなことは俺にだって言えたろうよ。異種族の忌まわしいモノに触れるまでもなくな。だが少なくとも司祭は外道の機械の扱いをわかってる。気に入ったぜ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Ha. J'aurais pu donner ce conseil sans poser un doigt sur cette immonde création xénos. Mais le prêtre sait au moins comment s'occuper des machines non-humaines. Voilà un érudit comme je les aime. »
languages.original_text: "Ha. I could have given that advice without laying a finger on the vile work of xenos. But at least the Priest knows how to deal with inhuman machinery. A scholar after my own heart."

traits.locale_text: « Ha. J'aurais pu donner ce conseil sans poser un doigt sur cette immonde création xénos. Mais le prêtre sait au moins comment s'occuper des machines non-humaines. Voilà un érudit comme je les aime. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Ja, yo podría haber deducido lo mismo sin necesidad de tocar ese maldito objeto xenos, pero al menos el sacerdote sabe cómo tratar con máquinas inhumanas. Me gusta cómo piensa este erudito».
languages.original_text: "Ha. I could have given that advice without laying a finger on the vile work of xenos. But at least the Priest knows how to deal with inhuman machinery. A scholar after my own heart."

traits.locale_text: «Ja, yo podría haber deducido lo mismo sin necesidad de tocar ese maldito objeto xenos, pero al menos el sacerdote sabe cómo tratar con máquinas inhumanas. Me gusta cómo piensa este erudito».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ha. Diesen Rat hätte ich Euch auch geben können, ohne einen Finger auf dieses üble Xenoswerk zu legen. Aber immerhin weiß der Priester, wie man mit nicht-menschlichen Maschinen umgeht. Ein Scholar nach meinem Geschmack."
languages.original_text: "Ha. I could have given that advice without laying a finger on the vile work of xenos. But at least the Priest knows how to deal with inhuman machinery. A scholar after my own heart."

traits.locale_text: "Ha. Diesen Rat hätte ich Euch auch geben können, ohne einen Finger auf dieses üble Xenoswerk zu legen. Aber immerhin weiß der Priester, wie man mit nicht-menschlichen Maschinen umgeht. Ein Scholar nach meinem Geschmack."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Hah. Ben bu tavsiyeyi zenoların şu aşağılık icadına elimi bile sürmeden verirdim. En azından Rahip, insan dışı makinelerle nasıl başa çıkacağını biliyor. Âlim gibi âlim."
languages.original_text: "Ha. I could have given that advice without laying a finger on the vile work of xenos. But at least the Priest knows how to deal with inhuman machinery. A scholar after my own heart."
